bugs.title: Where search not working
bugs.description: The Where search field in directory was non-functional due to missing Google API key and SafeGooglePlacesAutocomplete fallback
bugs.stepsToReproduce: Go to /directory, try to use Where field
bugs.expectedBehavior: Should allow location search with Google Places autocomplete
bugs.actualBehavior: Field was disabled with no visible error
bugs.fix: Added VITE_APP_GOOGLE_API_KEY to .env.local, configured Google Cloud API restrictions

bugs.title: Login background image not loading from settings
bugs.description: Image uploaded in admin branding settings didn't appear on login page - LoginSheet was hardcoded to default image
bugs.stepsToReproduce: Upload image in Admin > Settings > Branding, check provider login
bugs.fix: Added useEffect to fetch branding from /public/settings/branding API

bugs.title: getSettings returns branding data mixed with directory settings
bugs.description: Setting::all() returned branding records causing TypeError when frontend tried to set .name on a string value
bugs.stepsToReproduce: Click on any service in directory page
bugs.actualBehavior: TypeError: Cannot create property 'name' on string
bugs.fix: Changed Setting::all() to Setting::whereNull('parent')->get() in CustomerController

bugs.title: I am a Provider link broken
bugs.description: The 'I am a Provider' dropdown link pointed to /provider-portal/auth/login as a relative path on the customer portal domain
bugs.stepsToReproduce: Click user icon > I am a Provider on customer portal
bugs.expectedBehavior: Opens provider portal login in new tab
bugs.fix: Added VITE_APP_PROVIDER_PORTAL_URL env var and updated link to use absolute URL

bugs.title: Clicking any list item redirects to dashboard
bugs.description: All ResourceList pages generate links to /resource/show/:id but no show routes existed except for provider-companies. The catch-all route redirected all unmatched paths to dashboard.
bugs.stepsToReproduce: Click any item name in Services, Users, Customers, or any other list page
bugs.expectedBehavior: Should navigate to detail/show page for that record
bugs.actualBehavior: Redirects to dashboard (/) via catch-all route
bugs.fix: Created generic ResourceShow component and added show/:id routes for all 16 resources

bugs.title: Services and Directory links don't work
bugs.description: Clicking Services (or Directory when not logged in) in the top nav did nothing. The PublicLayout routes for /services, /directory, and /provider-profile were defined after catch-all wildcard routes (path='*') in AppRoutingSetup.tsx, so React Router matched the wildcard first.
bugs.stepsToReproduce: Go to customer portal, click Services in top nav
bugs.expectedBehavior: Navigate to /services page showing services listing
bugs.actualBehavior: Page doesn't change, stays on current page
bugs.fix: Moved PublicLayout route group above the catch-all wildcard routes in AppRoutingSetup.tsx

bugs.title: Service request wizard submit returns 500
bugs.description: POST /api/customer/store_service_request fails with 500 because MAIL_MAILER is set to smtp with host 'mailhog' which is not running. With QUEUE_CONNECTION=sync, the Mail::queue calls execute synchronously and the connection failure crashes the request.
bugs.stepsToReproduce: Complete all 4 wizard steps and click Submit Request
bugs.actualBehavior: 500 Internal Server Error - stream_socket_client(): getaddrinfo for mailhog failed
bugs.fix: Changed MAIL_MAILER from smtp to log in .env, set MAIL_FROM_ADDRESS to noreply@providr.com.au
